stories.text: There seems to be a constant narrative push of tech migration towards web3. And it seems to be coming primarily from VC firms having huge Web3 investments. I am yet to see an authentic dataset of this happening?
stories.title: Ask HN: What do you think about the Web3 migration narrative?
Could Russia plug the cloud gap with abandoned Western tech?

stories.text:
Can you give me the URL of a HN article, published between March and January (both inclusive), bound to an article written by a spy that explained how to get people to like you and influence them please? (A spy or someone working in the secret service of a country)
I think I remember one of the things he advised was to make people feel like they were making a choice.
stories.title: Ask HN: I ask for the link of an article of personal development published on HN
School board defies court ruling of discrimination against Asian students
Australia launches program to curb stalkerware
